file_content.text: Warning: Power remains offline in maximum security wing. All security personnel should be on alert.
Warning: Power failure detected in maximum security wing. Prisoner escape imminent.
Main generator must be reactivated to restore power. Chief engineer cannot be located.
Tools have been provided for necessary repairs. All security personnel, please respond.
Coordinates on-screen. Alarm will sound until generator repairs are complete and emergency reset is triggered.
Warning: Esh-kha cell block at fifteen percent power. Proceed with extreme caution.
[This monitoring station appears to be deactivated.]
